chapter.title: Flat Hunt Developer Guide
chapter.para: TRAFFIC [sa05], Touch [rk05] and Flat Hunt is software that hopefully makes learning to program more fun and more interesting for you. TRAFFIC is a library that supports the reading and display of public transportation systems. A library is a piece of software whose functionality can be used by other software. Flat Hunt is an application that uses the TRAFFIC library to model a city map. For the visualization the EiffelMedia Library (formerly known as ESDL [tgb03, bb04]) is used. Flat Hunt is a strategy game, similar to Scotland Yard, but with a different background story (for more information about the story and gameplay of Flat Hunt, see Flat Hunt User Guide). Touch is also an application that uses the TRAFFIC library. For more information on TRAFFIC and Touch: see [sa05] and [rk05] or visit this website: http://se.inf.ethz.ch/traffic.
